metadata.title: CVE-2024-12705 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Clients using DNS-over-HTTPS (DoH) can exhaust a DNS resolver's CPU and/ormemory by flooding it with crafted valid or invalid HTTP/2 traffic.This issue affects BIND 9 versions 9.18.0 through 9.18.32, 9.20.0 through9.20.4, 9.21.0 through 9.21.3, and 9.18.11-S1 through 9.18.32-S1.

criterions.comment: bind9 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
isc-dhcp package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
